activeInUI.description: Configuration keys that are displayed and manageable in the admin UI
activeInUI.action: KEEP - These are actively managed through the admin interface

backendOnly.description: Configuration keys used in backend code but not exposed in UI
backendOnly.action: REVIEW - Consider adding to UI or removing if unused

inSeedOnly.description: Configuration keys in seed.json but not referenced in code
inSeedOnly.action: REMOVE - These appear to be unused

missingFromSeed.description: Configuration keys used in code but missing from seed.json
missingFromSeed.action: ADD - These should be added to seed.json

recommendations.details: These keys are used in backend code but not exposed in the admin UI. Consider adding them to the UI or removing if truly unused.
recommendations.action: Add to SystemSettingsManager.tsx or remove from backend code

recommendations.description: Add missing configuration keys to seed.json
recommendations.details: These keys are used in the code but missing from the seed file, which could cause runtime errors.
recommendations.action: Add to prisma/seed.json with appropriate default values
